Articles.Content:
Here is a good moon rocket I made. used well it can go for a return trip.

However I need some form of lander part, for I ahve some lander legs but they dont want to go on. :\'(

Still, it can go for escape velocity and do heavy lifting.

Hope it works for others!
How does that work? There is no pic. XD
my appologies. But does the rocket itself go well for you?
to take screenshots use F1 key! then post them from the file labeled screenshots in your KSP file.
